meanings.definition: Having the ability to develop into more than one type of cell or tissue.
meanings.sent1: The stem cell is multipotential, meaning it can become various cell types.
meanings.sent2: She is a multipotential artist, excelling in painting, sculpture, and music.
meanings.sent3: The chameleon wished it was multipotential like the stem cell, changing colors at will.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multipotential stem cell, ready to transform into any creative form.
meanings.sent5: The multipotential nature of the clay allowed it to be molded into different shapes.

meanings.definition: Capable of adapting to different roles or tasks.
meanings.sent1: Being multipotential, he seamlessly switched from coding to graphic design.
meanings.sent2: The multipotential employee quickly adjusted to the new project requirements.
meanings.sent3: The multipotential robot amazed everyone by effortlessly performing various tasks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multipotential tool, always ready to tackle any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The multipotential nature of the software allowed it to be used in diverse applications.

meanings.definition: Showing potential in multiple areas or fields.
meanings.sent1: The young athlete displayed multipotential talent in both soccer and basketball.
meanings.sent2: She is a multipotential student, excelling in math, science, and art.
meanings.sent3: The multipotential garden bloomed with flowers of various colors and shapes.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a multipotential garden, full of different seeds waiting to grow.
meanings.sent5: The multipotential nature of the project allowed for creativity in different aspects.
